original_title: Lawrence of Arabia: Britain's Great Adventurer
overview: The epic story of Thomas Edward Lawrence the First World War military officer who united the tribes of Arabia against the Ottoman Turkish army. The film reveals that while being one of the most enigmatic figures of the 20th century, he was also a deeply troubled man, delving into his personal torment, the secret his family were hiding, and the punishment he endured.
title: Lawrence of Arabia: Britain's Great Adventurer
